
# Code of Conduct

This project is committed to a friendly, professional, and harassment-free experience for everyone.

## Expected behavior

- Be respectful and constructive.
- Assume good intent; ask clarifying questions.
- Focus on the work, not the person.
- Share context when reporting problems (steps, logs, environment).

## Unacceptable behavior

- Harassment, threats, or discriminatory language.
- Trolling, personal attacks, or deliberate disruption.
- Posting someone elseâ€™s private information.

## Scope

These rules apply in issues, pull requests, discussions, and other project spaces.

## Enforcement

Maintainers may remove content or restrict participation to keep the community safe and productive.
